thread.title: Meet Aulani’s ‘Ohana: Merchandise Hostess at Aulani, a Disney Resort & Spa
thread.title_full: Meet Aulani’s ‘Ohana: Merchandise Hostess at Aulani, a Disney Resort & Spa

author: Michael Ramirez
title: Meet Aulani’s ‘Ohana: Merchandise Hostess at Aulani, a Disney Resort & Spa
text:
Have you been on vacation only to realize you forgot your swim suit? At Aulani, a Disney Resort & Spa , you’ll not only find the items you forgot to pack, but you’ll also discover a variety of special gifts, Disney merchandise and more!
We are pleased to debut a new season of “ Meet Aulani’s ‘Ohana ” starting with Kelli, a merchandise hostess. Kelli connects with guests every day, helping to find not only what you’re looking for, but also the unexpected!

Did you know there are five merchandise locations at Aulani Resort? At Kalepa’s Store near the Maka‘ala lobby, you’ll find perfect Disney souvenirs, select grocery items and other sundries. Across the way, Hale Manu offers upscale gifts, including clothing, accessories and jewelry. Down in the Waikolohe Valley, the poolside Lava Shack stocks snacks, beach gear and other vacation necessities. Lastly, Laniwai Spa and Painted Sky offer spa products, beauty essentials and resort apparel.
